summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 24, 2019. It documents routine operations, staff leave, and inmate statuses, most notably listing inmate Jeffrey Epstein as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion. The report also notes equipment issues and staff shortages.

persons.context: Listed as inmate 476318-054 on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Suicide Watch
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein is documented as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Operations
events.description: Routine correctional facility activities including inmate admissions/releases, staff leave utilization, overtime hiring, and equipment status checks. A staff shortage led to the vacating of a correctional assignment in SHU #4.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
Local Hospice (location of an inmate with USMS guards)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein (inmate 476318-054) was on Suicide Watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York as of July 24, 2019.
Epstein had an inmate companion while on Suicide Watch.
The report notes a staff shortage that resulted in a correctional assignment in the Special Housing Unit (SHU #4) being vacated.
Fire and security reports were missing for the 2 Sallyport and 3 Sallyport areas, and main doors/fire exit doors and an inner gate were inoperative.
Another inmate was at a 'Local Hospice' under guard by the United States Marshals Service (USMS).
